definitions.definition: Of or relating to a system of government where the people have virtually no authority and the state wields absolute control of every aspect of the country, socially, financially , and politically.
examples: The divine truth is stronger than totalitarian falsehoods.

main_definition: Of or relating to a system of government where the people have virtually no authority and the state wields absolute control of every aspect of the country, socially, financially , and politically.
